title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Whether you are planning to bring your students out to the park or would like us to visit your classroom, Chaco Culture National Historical Park has many resources for teachers. Chaco Culture National Historical Park preserves a major center of ancestral Puebloan culture dating between 850 AD and 1250 AD.  The park is remarkable for its monumental architecture, art, astronomy, and agriculture. Chaco Culture National Park is a special place and was designated a World Heritage Site in 1987.
